caption.p: Phenotypic effects of the polymorphism CCR5Δ32 in human cells. WT/WT: wild-type homozygous genotype. WT/Δ32: heterozygous genotype. Δ32/Δ32: variant homozygous genotype. This figure was created using Servier Medical Art illustrations (available at https://smart.servier.com, under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License).
